title: Wand of acid
data:
{{version030}} {{item |itemtype = Wand |name = Wand of acid |cost = ? }} {{flavour|A magical device which throws a bolt of corrosive acid.}} A '''wand of acid''' shoots a [[Corrosive Bolt]], a powerful, somewhat inaccurate bolt which inflicts [[corrosion]] on its targets. Players will deal 4d(5.5 + 10.5 * [[Evocations]]/20) acid damage with this wand.{{source ref|0.30.0|zap-data.h|1391}}
Specifically, you'll deal 4d(13/4 + 3 * pow/20) damage, for pow = 15 + 3.5 * Evocations ({{source ref|0.30.0|evoke.cc|177}}). If you have the [[MP-Powered Wands]] mutation, then your "pow" gains a +33% boost. Players have a [[to-hit]] of 10.6 + (3.5 * Evocations)/25.{{source ref|0.30.0|zap-data.h|1392}} Monsters will deal 3d(7 + (30 + [[HD]])/12) damage with this wand.{{source ref|0.30.0|zap-data.h|1393}} It is [[alternate items|mutually exclusive]] with the [[wand of light]] and [[wand of quicksilver]]. ==Strategy== Wands of acid apply the [[Corrosion]] status, which lowers monster [[AC]] significantly. This can provide a surprising boost to damage, especially against tough enemies like [[orbs of fire]], especially when using fast weapons like [[Short Blades]]. These wands are also good as a backup attack. A Corrosive Bolt is effectively a level 6 spell, and with a few points into Evocations, as strong as one. Plus, only a few monsters resist acid. ===Tips & Tricks=== *Corrosion on monsters doesn't stack. *Beware of [[Ijyb]], the goblin with a wand (of acid). Bolt wands are easily the most dangerous wand for a D:3 or so character to face. Thankfully, wands of acid can only be fired at range 5. ==History== *Prior to [[0.29]], monsters dealt more damage with this wand. Also, the [[wand of light]] and [[wand of quicksilver]] weren't introduced yet, so acid was in 100% of games. *Prior to [[0.26]], bolts would have their range reduced by 1 for each target you hit. *Prior to [[0.21]], wands of acid could hold at most 15 charges. *Wands of acid were added in [[0.18]]. ==References== {{wands}}
